bullets: Developed a narrative game platform built with TypeScript, AWS, and React Unity WebGL, enhancing user engagement and storytelling.
Innovated feature flag management using caching in AWS Lambdas, Redux, and remote APIs, significantly improving system stability.
Spearheaded the integration of Datadog Analytics and crafted live displays using ReCharts graphs.
Revamped GitLab deployment scripts, transitioning to more efficient deployments that are reliant on git tags.
Migrated a graph database to Postgres using Express, Prisma, and SQL.
Acted as Scrum Master, contributing to the development of Workday's content management site using Docker, PHP, and MySQL.
Enhanced site functionality with new features like content audit tools, archival, and community operations.
Assembled user interfaces with React for improved feedback and search.
Optimized unit tests, reducing bugs and preventing site downtime.
Created a utility bill calculator to accurately predict customer electricity costs for anywhere in the United States, boosting customer trust and minimizing legal risks.
Redesigned a solar pricing engine, enhancing clarity and adapting to product changes with improved test coverage.
Crafted SQL queries for efficient data retrieval and object-relational mappings, optimizing database interactions.
Implemented automated tests, Splunk logging, data auditing, input validation and removed outdated dependencies.
Diagnosed and resolved issues during live production releases that preserved thousands of dollars of revenue.
Developed a web portal using C# and stored procedures to retrieve customer data from over 20 insurance agencies.
Programmed responsive interfaces that display data structures derived from databases, algorithms, and callbacks.
Designed the front-end of an enterprise web application using the .NET MVC framework and JavaScript.
Constructed interfaces using controls such as grids, graphs, drop-downs, and calendars with agile workflow.
Established a file sharing server for students across campus, resulting in renewed enthusiasm among teachers and staff.
Verified and documented over 40 software errors and rewrote a popular tutorial, increasing product quality.
Taught a rigorous networking certification course to over 20 professionals and rewrote three certification exams.
